explore_games: Explore a vast collection of games and scenarios. Dive into unique storylines and find your next favorite game.
login_failed: Incorrect username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
name: Name
register_subtitle: Join now to explore our games
logout_confirmation_message: Please please that you want to logout from this device
forge_legend_desc: Embark on quests where every choice etches your story in the annals of this realm
explore_realms_desc: Journey through mystical lands filled with ancient secrets and hidden dangers
shape_destiny_desc: Each decision branches into new possibilities carving your unique path to glory
get_the_full_experience_desc: Register to get access to your game history, achievements and recommended scenarios
map_tutorial_move: Move the map by dragging with one finger.
map_tutorial_zoom: Zoom in/out using pinch gestures or double-tap.
map_tutorial_gps: Tap the GPS button to follow your location.
map_tutorial_arrow: A navigation arrow appears if the destination is off-screen.
map_tutorial_pin: A pin or circle marks your current destination.
map_tutorial_label: The destination name appears when zoomed in and visible.
map_tutorial_compass: Tap the compass to reset map rotation.
map_tutorial_distance: Tap the meters/distance label to focus the map on the destination.
location_permission_explanation: GoTale needs your location to guide you through the adventures and unlock stories at specific places. Your journey begins where you stand!
enable_location_services: Please enable Location Services in your device settings to continue your adventure.
location_permission_required: Location access is required to play GoTale. Please grant permission to continue.
open_settings_enable_location: Please open settings and enable location access to continue your adventure.
location_required_description: Confirm arrival at the destination on the map to unlock the story.
reset_settings_message: Are you sure you want to restore default settings? This action cannot be undone
arrived_message_description: You can now make a choice at this location and continue your adventure.
one_finger_drag: Move around the map by dragging with your finger
zoom_in_out: Zoom in/out using pinch gestures or double tap
gps_button: Tap the GPS button to track your location
navigation_arrow: Navigation arrow appears when the destination is off screen
pin_or_circle: A pin marks the current destination
destination_name: Destination name appears when visible and zoomed in enough
compass_click: Tap the compass to reset map rotation
distance_label: Tap the meters label to center the map on destination
